definitions: denoting or relating to a period of a thousand years

examples.text: the current increase in hurricanes is only a small fluctuation within this longer millennial cycle

shortDefinitions: relating to period of thousand years

definitions: denoting or relating to an anniversary of a thousand years

examples.text: the millennial anniversary of Leif Eiriksson's voyage to the New World
the millennial celebrations in New York's Times Square

shortDefinitions: relating to anniversary of thousand years

definitions: denoting people reaching young adulthood in the early 21st century

examples.text: most social networking groups are dominated by the millennial generation

shortDefinitions: denoting people reaching young adulthood in early 21st century

definitions: a person reaching young adulthood in the early 21st century

examples.text: the industry brims with theories on what makes millennials tick
another distinguishing feature of Millennials is that they come to college from a lifestyle that was highly scheduled

shortDefinitions: person reaching young adulthood in early 21st century
